pxchat.whiteboard
Class ImageObject

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.protocol.frames.Frame
      pxchat.whiteboard.PaintObject
          pxchat.whiteboard.ImageObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ImageObject
extends PaintObject

This class represents an image on the paint board. It has a position and a size.

getImage

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
Returns:

getResizedImage

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getResizedImage()
Returns the resized image of this image object. If the current image is smaller or equal than the size of this image object, the current image is returned. Otherwise a resized image is returned. Returns null if no image is specified.

Returns:
The resized image, or the image itself
